articles.description:
It was interesting to see EFA President Aleksander Ceferin on Thursday when he said “football is not for sale” in response to new proposals for a Super League. The remarks came after a European Court of Justice ruling that UEFA and FIFA contravened EU law by stopping the formation of the European Super League. Football may […]
The post UEFA Don’t care about us the Football Fans appeared first on Celtic Fanzine.
articles.title: UEFA Don’t care about us the Football Fans

articles.description:
So much has happened this season so. We celebrated 25 years of St. Margaret’s CSC and the impact our supporters club has had in our area for Celtic fans wanting to watch Celtic in the flesh. The friendships made, the highs and lows of following Celtic and the success Celtic have had in that time […]

articles.title: Football without fans is nothing
